metadata.title: CVE-2024-38607 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved:macintosh/via-macii: Fix "BUG: sleeping function called from invalidcontext" The via-macii ADB driver calls request_irq() after disabling hardinterrupts. But disabling interrupts isn't necessary here because the VIAshift register interrupt was masked during VIA1 initialization.
